title: Orange County to distribute COVID-19 vaccines at Galleria at Crystal Run mall
author: Mike Randall; Times Herald-Record
description: Orange County will distribute first doses of the Moderna COVID-19 vaccine at the Galleria at Crystal Run on Saturday
cleaned_text: Orange County to distribute COVID-19 vaccines at Galleria at Crystal Run mall MIDDLETOWN - Orange County will host a COVID-19 vaccination site from 11:30 a.m. to 3 p.m. Saturday at the Galleria at Crystal Run. Free first doses of the Moderna vaccine will be offered at center court on the lower level in front of J.C.Penney's and Round 1. While walk-ins are welcome, guests are encouraged to make an
